ModMetaData.name: SoS2 Hologram Darklight Glow
ModMetaData.author: vaer
ModMetaData.description: Are your pawns a) following an ideology with the Lighting precept, b) holographic, and c) crying about their own emitted light? With this hacky patch applied, Save our Ship 2 holograms now emit dark light instead of regular light. I'm not smart enough to make it a toggle, them's the breaks.
